*div1 type="summary"* *p*Appointment and instructions as election judges.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*To *person_mentioned*Moses Morrison*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Wm Kincheloe*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Ay C. Buckner*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*You are hereby appointed *person_mentioned*judges of the election */person_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*Alcalde for the *location_mentioned*district of Mina*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* to be held at the*location_mentioned* house of *person_mentioned*Capt Amos Bawls*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, on Saturday the *date_mentioned n="01-14-1826">14th*/date_mentioned* instant agreeably to Notice issued by me, you will keep duplicate Poll Books of said election to be signed by each one of you, one of said Poll Books you will deliver to the new *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*elected which will serve as his authority to act. The other Poll Book you will send to me— You will also administer the oath to the new *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*to support the Mexican Constitution and that of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned* and faithfully to discharge the duties of *person_mentioned*Alcalde of the *location_mentioned*district of Mina*/location_mentioned* */person_mentioned*for the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826*/date_mentioned* and thereafter until another is elected and qualified— A certificate that you had administered said oath must be put at the foot of each poll Book and signed by the *person_mentioned*judges */person_mentioned*you will also deliver this official order to the new *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*to be filed in his *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*as a public document.*/p* *p**location_mentioned*Sn felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-04-1826">4th Jany 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Political Chief of this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
